pr_title: Remove immutable indices from compliance config

timeline.bodyText: nit: construct WildcardMatcher inside OpenDistroSecurityFilter to fully encapsulate implementation details (whether it is implemented as WildcardMatcher or differently is internal to OpenDistroSecurityFilter). Move logging of immutableIndices to the OpenDistroSecurityFilter as well.
